pages.text: Oh, you managed to assemble the $(l:sim_1/3_creosote)Coke Oven$(), good for you.$(br2)I'm going to mark that down for you in your evaluation summary that I have in front of me.$(br2)*writes* $(o)Can build pointlessly old technology at a ridiculously slow pace.$()

With some of your newfound knowledge you should be able to make a more $(item)Heat Resistant$() type of brick.$(br2)Try to avoid burning your pretty little fingers though, you'll need all 10 of them to complete all of your future tasks!
This is the heart of the $(item)Smeltery$(), you will need one before you can start $(item)Smelting$() things.$()$(br2)Required knowledge:$(br)$(l:sim_1/knowledge/1_smelting)Smelting Knowledge$()
The tank holds fuel which the $(item)Smeltery$() needs to function.$(br2)You will need a $(item)Crucible$() to produce your first fuel.

The crucible can smelt $(item)Solids$() into $(item)Hot Liquids$(), you can use a $(item)Jerrycan$() to move the $(item)Liquid$() when it's molten.$(br2)Check the uses of the $(item)Crucible$() in JEI to see valid$(br)$(item)Heat-sources$().
You have two choices, you can either go find a $(item)Lava Source$() to put the $(item)Crucible$() over, or you could craft a $(item)Magma Block$() from the dusts you sifted.$(br2)Your call.

Since you do not have the metals to make a $(item)Bucket$() we will have to use another fuel for our $(item)Smeltery$(), you can smelt some of the dusts you sifted earlier.$(br2)You can produce one buckets worth of the stuff by melting a $(item)Blaze Powder Block$() in the $(item)Crucible$().
